Changes For 1.0.3
[LittleDog Historic Changes]

Changes

This section describes all API and user-visible changes between LittleDog release 1.0.2 and LittleDog release 1.0.3.

bdiPlot

  • This release includes an updated version of bdiPlot that contains internal changes.

LittleDog

  • Increased the LittleDog software version number to 1.0.3
  • Added details to some internal error print statements that the user may see.
  • Method getBulkRobotInputs() was added. See class documentation. This method may be used to simplify user software. This method is the main reason for having a new release.

LittleDogDataSetFileReader

  • The constructor no longer access violates if the data file fails to load (on account of a bad file name or bad file).

example/calib

  • main.cpp now handles ^C better.

Generated on Wed Dec 31 14:18:26 2008 for LittleDog API by  1.3.9.1
